name: D'selva Infotech
description:
GFN D’Selva Infotech Pvt. Ltd. is an Offshore Software Development specialist that combines the definite bottom-line benefits of Offshore Outsourcing with its recognized expertise in strategic global models that helps in providing reliable Outsourcing Software Development Solutions.
Our operations are ISO 9001: 2008 (Quality Management systems), ISO20000-1:2005 (IT Security management System), & ISO27001:2005 (Information Security Management System) to ensure the quality of service, support, client’s confidentiality & Security.
Our goal is to deliver premium quality software development services and products while giving unmatched value to enterprises worldwide at an affordable cost.
Services:
GFN D'selva provides multiple lines of services which include Custom Software Development, E-Commerce Development, Mobile Development, Web Development and ERP Development, Business Process, Digital marketing, Search engine optimization etc. We are always ready to facilitate Industries with demanding solutions.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 551-553, fifth floor, JMD Megapolis, Sohna Road
